profile.title: User Profile
profile.mustLogin: Nɔ ni o yɛ login kɛ o he niŋ settings lɛ.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: He original ni ni tsɔɔ ni gbɛi lɛ
profile.filterExplicit: He lɛ ehiɛ gbɛi ni nɔ ewo
profile.enableReadReceipts: Tee nɔ ni wo kɛɛ lɛ he
profile.allowExplicitContent: Tee ehiɛ gbɛi ni nɔ ewo
profile.disappearingMessages: Tee nɔ ni nɔ ehiɛ lɛ
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Seconds ni nɔ lɛ nɔ ehiɛ lɛ
profile.saveError: Mɔ ko: Enii nɔ kɛɛ settings lɛ
profile.avatarError: Mɔ ko ni ekɛ foto lɛ
profile.noPrivateKey: Private key ni ni o yɛ lɛ nɔ he nɔ mli he.
profile.setBackupPassword: Kɛ password kɛ he ni o kɛɛ backup lɛ:
profile.backupDownloaded: Encrypted backup lɛ nɔ tsɔɔ lɛ.
profile.exportFailed: Export key lɛ nɔ yɛ nɔ mɔ ko
profile.enterBackupPassword: Tɔ password ni lɛ ni o kɛɛ backup lɛ:
profile.importSuccess: Private key lɛ nɔ yɛ he nɔ mli lɛ.
profile.importFailed: Import key lɛ nɔ yɛ nɔ mɔ ko (password mɔ ko ana file lɛ yɛ yɛ nɔ mɔ ko).
profile.keysRotated: Key foforɔ lɛ nɔ yɛ lɛ ni public key nɔ kɛɛ lɛ.
profile.rotateFailed: Rotate keys lɛ nɔ yɛ nɔ mɔ ko.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Private key lɛ nɔ yɛ nɔ mli lɛ. Kɛ password-protected copy kɛ yɛ he nɔ mli foforɔ lɛ.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Forward incoming calls ni texts kɛ o verified phone ana email. Calls/texts ni ekɛɛ lɛ yɛ o Chatforia number lɛ.
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Phone ni yɛ he (E.164) kɛ calls lɛ

chat.selectPrompt: Kɛ text ana chat room ni o he yɛ
